subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Lakota voice---maybe?
author: Rhonda W
full_text:
--0-1195045436-1205797508=:98900
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hey Frank do you have any info on this recording?  Where was it done? Was there a question asked and that was in with the response?  I have a Lakhota friend that Im gonna ask if its his language or not and if it is if he can translate for us.  But Im gonna need a bit of background info cuz if it is hislanguage then he is gonna be all questions lol.
   
  Rhonda
  

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           In the middle is a voice that sounds Lakota, or Souix, "....Haut(hot)-Wu-Tonka..." Any guesses? This is from the Ghostman, last month. It pays to go over the recordings more than once. 
 
 Frank-S
